produtos.title: Step 1: Download
produtos.description: Kickstart with GitHub! Either fork the AstroWind template or simply click 'Use this template'. Your canvas awaits, ready for your digital masterpiece.

produtos.title: Step 2: Add content
produtos.description: Pour your vision into it. Add images, text, and all that jazz to breathe life into your digital space.

produtos.title: Step 3: Customize styles
produtos.description: Tailor colors, fonts, and layouts until it feels just right. Your unique flair, amplified by AstroWind!

produtos.title: Ready!
produtos.description: You've set the foundation, added your content, customized it. Now it's ready to shine!
